Summary: Flying objects about 250" up-large, concentric, lights in circles in front.
divs: sighting detailsi was asleep on my living room couch without a\c on and windows open. i awoke completely and suddenly due to a loud, rumbling type sound permeating the house (like a loud train going by-but no train track nearby-didn't sound like a jet engine either). a glance at the kitchen clock showed about 2:30 a.m. i rushed outside through my east facing front door because i though maybe a low flying helicopter or something going on in the street running past my home. i-95 is also about 1\2-3\4 mile due east and i can see shuttle launches in the distance to the east or northeast. there was something going by overhead, traveling north to south (my left to right), in front of and above me (like from 10 o'clock toward 2 o'clock), clearly paralleling i-95 and just to the west of the highway (between me and the highway). it appeared to be a few hundred feet up in the air (250'-300' or so). what immediately looked odd to me was the fact that there was a large, concentric circle of rectangular lights and another circle of similar lights inside that under the underneath (ground side) of the craft and toward or at the front. i did n't have time to count them, but there were about 1 1\2-2 dozen, fairly bright lights (like leds). toward the rear (north end) was a single, steady red light. it appeared to be centered on the mass of the craft in front of it. forward from the red light about maybe a 1\3 of the way towards the light circles there were 2, steady. white lights, one left and one right. they appeared to be equidistant from each other, the red light, and the circular lights. the sky was hazy because the stars were not visible, but about a one-quarter or crescent moon was visible and i saw one other "star" (no doubt a planet) i nth sky to the southeast. there was no apparent fog or haze between me and the craft. however, i could not pick up a clear outline of the craft against that dark sky. my impression was that it was rectangular, oval, or oblong based upon the placement of the lights. no neighbors appeared to be up-the windows were shut, lights off, a\cs running. it was muggy and temperature maybe mid-70's. i sat on my front steps for 5 to 8 minutes and thought about how odd and large the circle light pattern was as i had never seen anything like that on aircraft. it absolutely was not a standard helicoper or aircraft. i did wonder if it might be some top secret military craft be shuttled to patrick afb not too far south. i went back inside for 2-3 minutes with lights off, when i heard the same time of rumble increasing in loudness. from the kitchen i grabbed a led flashlight, and went bacl out the front door. a 2nd craft which appeared exactly like the first one had already gone by and to my right (south). it appeared to be at virtually the same height, speed (maybe 60-90mph.), and path as the first one and i watched it go out of sight to the south over period of maybe a minute or so. i did try flashing and pointing my flashlight at it, but there was no reaction. this morning, around 8:30 a.m., i was driving when i saw a brevard county sheriff's dept. car parked near my development. i stopped, asked whether any strange aircraft sightings had been reported overnight (he said "no"), and listened why he explained that i might have seen a helicopter of aircraft spraying for mosquitos over night when they operate. but, when i showed him a crude drawing and notes i had made (i was going to try to research this experience at the library because i don't have home access), he was puzzled and said it wasn't like such mosquito spraying aircraft. he suggested that if i had a camera and was lucky enough to have another opportunity and could photograph something, that the dept. would be interested in seeing that. relative to a sketch, i do not have access to do so.
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Cocoa
There were no other sightings in Cocoa on or around June 11th 2009
